formBuilderDemo.title: Form Builder Demo
formBuilderDemo.summary: This demo is built with React and Vite. It offers a one-stop form editing experience, including quick text modifications, flexible addition and modification of various form elements, and real-time preview functionality, allowing users to easily create and customize the forms they need.

dota2MatchVisualzier.title: Dota2 Match Visualzier
dota2MatchVisualzier.summary: This demo is built with React and Vite. It aims at visualizing match data from the popular e-sports game Dota 2. It utilizes various visualization techniques, such as line charts, area charts, and heatmaps, to present the data in an insightful and interactive manner.
